the zooxanthellae that coral have a symbiotic relationship with are actually dinoflagellates, not algae. However, dinoflagellates and brown algae are both chromalveolates, so perhaps that's where the confusion came from. Not all single celled photosynthetic organisms in the ocean are algae. In fact, most of them aren't!
